K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-005:9a-2: dge 'dun la phyag 'tshal lo; ;'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang po byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-005:9a-3: de rnams la phyag 'tshal nas rig pa 'di 'dzin gyi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-005:9a-4: rig pa 'di bdag la grub par gyur cig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-005:9a-6: ha na ha na s'a ne /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-005:9a-10: p'urba yo ga ma nu sma ra phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-005:9b-0: gang @9b gis rig pa 'di bklags pa de tshe rabs brgyad stong du skye ba dran par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-005:9b-1: 'di nas shi 'phos nas kyang bde ldan gyi 'jig rten du skye bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-005:9b-2: bde ldan gyi snying po rdzogs so;;
